title: Mahindra Group to invest Rs 37,000 crore in auto sector, plans to launch 23 new vehicles by 2030
description: Mahindra Group announces plans to invest Rs 37,000 crore in the auto sector over the next three years, with a focus on launching 23 new vehicles by 2030. The investment includes new ICE SUVs, BEVs, and light commercial vehicles. The company emphasizes the importance of ICE models in the short term while investing significantly in the EV segment. The expansion plans also include enhancing manufacturing capacity and remaining open to future mobility trends, including hybrid vehicles. The company welcomes India's new EV policy and emphasizes its commitment to the 'Make in India' initiative.
